remarks: The base set of a subspace is included in the parent base set. (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspba.x $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
sspba.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
sspba.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspba $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) -> Y C_ X ) $.
